alert.note: Alert for Addison (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 5:52PM EDT until July 14 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Essex County in northern New York... West central Addison County in central Vermont... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 551 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Russia, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Westport, Elizabethtown, Panton, Addison, Ferrisburgh, Young Bay, Ship Point, Hunter Bay, North West Bay, Mud Island, Partridge Harbor, Potash Bay, Mineville, White Bay, Moriah Center, New Russia, South Bay In Essex County, Button Bay State Park, Cold Spring Bay, and Barber Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Boaters on Lake Champlain should seek safe harbor now! Strong winds will cause higher waves and sudden wind shifts may overturn boats. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
